Cloudflare Framework

Cloudflare Framework: Build Edge Apps with Clodo

Discover the best framework for Cloudflare Workers. Learn Clodo Framework, compare alternatives, and build production-ready edge applications.

Table of Contents

  • What is a Cloudflare Framework?
  • Why Choose Clodo Framework?
  • Framework Comparison
  • Getting Started with Clodo
  • Deployment & Scaling
  • Frequently Asked Questions

What is a Cloudflare Framework?

A Cloudflare framework is a development toolkit that simplifies building applications on Cloudflare's global edge network. These frameworks provide:

  • Routing & Middleware: Easy API endpoint creation and request handling
  • Database Integration: Built-in support for Cloudflare D1, KV, and external databases
  • Authentication: User management and security features
  • Deployment Tools: Simplified publishing to Cloudflare's edge

Popular Cloudflare frameworks include Clodo, Hono, and Worktop, each with different strengths for various use cases.

Why Choose Clodo Framework?

Clodo Framework stands out as the most comprehensive solution for building enterprise applications on Cloudflare Workers:

Enterprise Ready

Multi-tenant architecture, advanced security, and production monitoring built-in.

Full-Stack Features

Database integrations, authentication, API management, and more.

Developer Experience

Excellent TypeScript support, intuitive APIs, and comprehensive documentation.

Global Performance

Deploy to 200+ data centers with automatic scaling and edge optimization.

Framework Comparison: Clodo vs Hono vs Worktop

Here's how Clodo compares to other popular Cloudflare frameworks:

Feature Clodo Hono Worktop
Multi-Tenant Support ✅ Built-in ❌ Manual ❌ Manual
Database Integration ✅ D1, KV, External ✅ Basic ✅ Basic
TypeScript Support ✅ Excellent ✅ Good ✅ Good
Enterprise Features ✅ Authentication, Monitoring ❌ Limited ❌ Limited
Learning Curve Medium Easy Easy

View detailed comparison →

Getting Started with Clodo Framework

Install and create your first Clodo application:

# Install Clodo CLI
npm install -g @clodo/cli

# Create new project
clodo create my-app

# Navigate to project
cd my-app

# Start development server
npm run dev

Complete Quick Start Guide →

Deployment & Scaling

Deploy your Clodo application globally with one command:

# Deploy to Cloudflare
npm run deploy

Clodo automatically handles:

  • Global edge deployment across 200+ data centers
  • Automatic scaling based on traffic
  • Zero-downtime updates
  • Built-in CDN and security features

Frequently Asked Questions

What is a Cloudflare framework?

A Cloudflare framework is a development toolkit that simplifies building applications on Cloudflare's edge network, particularly Cloudflare Workers. It provides abstractions, routing, middleware, and integrations to make serverless development easier.

Why choose Clodo as your Cloudflare framework?

Clodo Framework offers enterprise-ready features like multi-tenant architecture, database integrations, authentication, and global deployment. It's designed specifically for production applications on Cloudflare Workers with excellent performance and developer experience.

How does Clodo compare to Hono and Worktop?

Clodo provides more comprehensive enterprise features and better TypeScript support compared to Hono and Worktop. While Hono excels in lightweight routing and Worktop in simplicity, Clodo offers full-stack capabilities for complex applications.

Is Clodo Framework free?

Yes! Clodo Framework is open-source and free to use. You only pay for Cloudflare Workers compute time, which has a generous free tier of 100,000 requests per day.

Can I deploy Clodo apps globally?

Absolutely! Clodo Framework deploys to Cloudflare's 200+ global data centers, ensuring low-latency responses worldwide. It's built for edge computing from the ground up.

Ready to Build with Clodo?

Start building edge applications with the most powerful Cloudflare framework available.
